summary.Title: PROCESS ENGINEER
summary.Presentation: The Interroll Center of Excellence in Copenhagen, Denmark concentrates on Belt Drives and Conveyors used in checkouts and reverse vending machines for supermarkets, and light industrial app

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
The Interroll Center of Excellence in Copenhagen, Denmark concentrates on Belt Drives and Conveyors used in checkouts and reverse vending machines for supermarkets, and light industrial application including production logistics, where automation plays a crucial role.

As an innovation leader, the company aims to set standards for modern material flow – in the development of new products as well as in the further development of existing solutions. A special focus is placed on the effects of digitization on value chains.

The position is part of a succession plan and reports to the Manager of Production Technology.


Our new Process Engineer will:

  • Be spearheading our efforts on developing “Interroll Production System” which is our manufacturing concept based on the “Industry 4.0” (Digitalization, IoT) principles. This includes digital Kanban, MES (paperless factory) & Digital TPM
  • Be working on optimization and re-design of our factory layout and investments in new equipment
  • Conduct tests and monitor the process performance throughout production
  • Evaluate processes and equipment to ensure compliance with environmental and safety regulations

 

Qualifications

The ideal candidate;

  • Is team-oriented, accountable to the team and willing to seek improvements through teamwork
  • Has minimum a bachelor’s degree in engineering or related field preferred, with minimum 3+ years’ experience working in a manufacturing environment
  • Promotes a safe work environment and safe work habits by personally exhibiting the necessary behaviors
  • Has knowledge and interest within development and adaption of production processes to fit the ideals of “Industry 4.0” (Digitalization, IoT)
  • Has experience on production related equipment and preventive, and predictive maintenance as well as diagnostic and repair operations are considered an advantage
  • Has excellent command of the English language, and Danish language skills are considered a significant advantage
  • Has proficiency in drafting software (CAD tools) and MS Office software


Information

The position at Interroll offers you:

  • To be a part of a global leading provider of material handling solutions with 2.300 employees in 35 countries. Our focus is to become a preferred partner to our customers. We focus on future customer needs and State-of-the-art innovation
  • The opportunity to work in a global engineering environment with experts and sales teams around the globe, where some travel activity can be expected
  • A competitive package, including pension & private health insurance

 

Apply

If you are interested and feel you are the right person for the job, do not hesitate to send a short application along with your resume. TEMP-TEAM A/S is responsible for this recruitment and all inquiries must be directed to TEMP-TEAM.

 

TEMP-TEAM

TEMP-TEAM A/S is a national recruitment and temp agency with eight local branches in Denmark. We have more than 40 years of experience within staffing and covers a wide range of branches. We provide an excellent service of high quality and a close personal contact to our candidates and clients. 

TEMP-TEAM is a part of JuhlerGroup - an international group of recruitment agencies.
